Fractol 
=======

My fractol proj in c and raylib with gruvbox theme 

Quick Start 
-----------
Run : 
```bash
make clean && make 
./mandelbrot
```

Credits 
-------
- Raylib : https://www.raylib.com/
- FrexG : https://github.com/FrexG/Mandelbrot-Fractal
- GruvBox : https://github.com/morhetz/gruvbox
